data.title: History and Genealogy of Lake Maxinkuckee
data.meta_description: History and Genealogy of Lake Maxinkuckee and much more
data.text:
Adolph (Aron Löb) Arnold

BIRTH 27 Apr 1839 Jebenhausen, Goppingen, Baden-Württemberg, Germany

DEATH 10 Oct 1910 Terre Huate Vigo county Indiana

BURIAL 12 Oct 1910 Highland Lawn Cemetery Terre Haute, Vigo County, Indiana

son of Abraham Anschel Arnold and Mathilde Madel Gutmann

Adolph Arnold had a clothing store at the north east corner of Second and Wabash - Terre Haute

David and Adolph Arnold provided financial assistance to Adolph Herz who on On Feb. 17, 1869 purchased a hoop skirt factory and notions store at 12 S. Fourth St. in Terre Haute from Benjamin Weisz.

Adolph Arnold, 71 years old, a pioneer merchant of Terre Haute, died at his home, 1125 South Fifth Street Moanday, following a stroke. Terre Haute Tribune Newspaper, 11 Oct 1910, Page 1

MARRIED 1871 Katinka Goldsmith Birth 19 Dec 1848 Boston, Massachusetts Death 15 Oct 1941 Terre Haute, Vigo, Indiana BURIAL 17 Oct 1941 Highland Lawn Cemetery Terre Haute, Vigo County, Indiana dau of William Goldsmith

Children:

Helen Louise Arnold BIRTH 31 Oct 1871 DEATH 10 Apr 1910 Chicago, Cook County, Illinois, BURIAL 12 Apr 1910 Highland Lawn Cemetery Terre Haute, Vigo County, Indiana,

Emma Ann Arnold BIRTH 1 DEC 1872 Terre Hauto, Ind DEATH 18 OCT 1967 Columbus, Bartholomew, Indiana married 8 Jun 1896 Vigo County, Indiana Theodore Paul Frank
